Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the spacious outdoor market

A spacious marketplace bustling with morning tradingfilled with casual afternoon tradingbustling with the sounds of last minute evening tradesfilled with the quiet sounds of murky late night trades. It is a large, rectangular area roped off on three sides to divide it from the streets. The western and eastern walls are shared with neighboring buildings. The northern wall is part of the main border of Docktown, it is lined with five small, dusty tents. The central area is filled with many blankets for people to sit and sell or trade their wares. There are a half dozen tables scattered throughout the open areas of the marketplace. There are several exit points from the marketplace: To the northeast is Helloise Way as is the west, to the east is Sea Street, to the south is Market Street, on the southeast however is the Brewery's patio. $[$place = ${IronClaw:Rooms:UrOutside};] {? | $(place.details:haybales:hidden) || Several soft, flaxen hay bales are scattered about. }
A spacious, bustling marketplace.

A spacious marketplace bustling with morning tradingfilled with casual afternoon tradingbustling with the sounds of last minute evening tradesfilled with the quiet sounds of murky late night trades. It is a large, roped off rectangular area filled with many small tents, tables and blankets spread with various wares. There are several exit points from the marketplace: To the northeast is Helloise Way as is the west, to the east is Sea Street, to the south is Market Street, on the southeast however is the Brewery's patio. $[$place = ${IronClaw:Rooms:UrOutside};] {? | $(place.details:haybales:hidden) || Several soft, flaxen hay bales are scattered about. }
http://www.skotos.net/IronclawGame/images/maps/night/docktown/streets/market/courtyard.jpg

dusty red tent
A relatively small tent made of dark red canvas standing against the northern wall. It is about six feet tall at its center. A small tent flap is located on one side to allow entrance.
The first dusty tent in a series of five lining the northern wall.
dusty yellow tent
A relatively small tent made of dark yellow canvas standing against the northern wall. It is about six feet tall at its center. A small tent flap is located on one side to allow entrance.
The second dusty tent in a series of five lining the northern wall.

A relatively small tent made of dark purple canvas standing against the northern wall. It is about six feet tall at its center. A small tent flap is located on one side to allow entrance.
The fourth dusty tent in a series of five lining the northern wall.
dusty green tent
A relatively small tent made of dark green canvas standing against the northern wall. It is about six feet tall at its center. A small tent flap is located on one side to allow entrance.
The fifth dusty tent in a series of five lining the northern wall.
the prison bars
Bars surrounding a section of the market, seperating a small area around the prison from the rest of the market.

The center of this bustling marketplace.

the oil lanterns
A number of identical oil lanterns are mounted on the walls, filling the marketplace with a warm, rich glow. They are made of glass panes set into an octagonal brass base and top.
the eastern rope
A long, thick rope dividing the eastern side of the marketplace from the street. The rope parts about midway and ties to two poles to allow entrance.
the southern rope
A long, thick rope dividing the southern side of the marketplace from the street. The rope parts about midway and ties to two poles to allow entrance.
the western rope
A long, thick rope dividing the western side of the marketplace from the street.
the five dusty tents
The five dusty tents lining the northern wall of the marketplace.
the eastern wall
The eastern wall.
the northern wall
The northern wall is a portion of the main border of Docktown. It is lined with several small, dusty tents.
the western wall
The western wall.
the merchandise on the scattered tables
Merchandise neatly arranged on scattered tables around the marketplace.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{Oh oh did you see that a man in a red feather hat just walked by, was that an assassin?\|You swear you just saw a man in a mask hop down from a nearby building.\|There! Did you see it? That man just flashed a gun at you, or was it a quill?\| Is it me or are the rooftops more active now then usual?\}

X[S] \{Burly\|Watchful\|Stern\|Serious\} \{Rinaldi guard in constable uniform \|uniformed Avoirdupois guards\} are \{busy patrolling\|focused guarding\|purposefully pacing\|determinedly watching\} the commons. Anyone wearing a mask and hat are instantly harassed.

X[S] \{Busy constables patrol the area, they take special interest in any mice, rats, or other typical swamp people races.\| You probably get a thorough looking over by suspicious minded constables.\| You here the patrolling constables gossiping.."You see the way that swamp rat gutted that cat, it's a miracle he's alive.\}
"Ilana is attempting to check if you are 18 years old or older. Will you allow this?"
